name: On earth as in heaven
description:
Team name

Manga Tekzat Productions

_____________________________

On the occasion of the Epic Mega Jam 2020, we made this prototype to meet the imposed theme, "It's been a long time, but we're not done yet".

Your Mission :

You are a Christian hero who is sent into the world with the power of God given by the Name of Jesus as the Bible says. Your goal, hunted down the demons, helping people with spiritual equipment starting with the bronze armor and trying to get the golden armor before Jesus returned. Would you be able to do that?

_____________________________

All the modeling and animations are done by both of us. The Landscape made with World Creator 2. Everything was done during the contest from Friday, December 4, 2020 in the evening until Friday, December 11, 2020 morning.

The only modeling that doesn't come from us is the piece of bread downloaded from megascans and the UE4 mannequin The textures were taken also on Quixel Megascans.

LUT comes from the Amplify pack we had before

The music and sound effects come from:

Music for Games | We Love Indies
